executiveSummary: Mark Evan and Chris Soria, co-founders of Maniac Pumpkin Carvers from New York, pitched their business on Shark Tank seeking $150,000 for 8% equity to expand their 'School of Pumpkin'â€”an online carving class platform. Despite showcasing their artistry and moderate sales, all sharks declined to invest, citing scalability issues and seasonality of the business.
nextSteps: Mark and Chris plan to continue growing Maniac Pumpkin Carvers independently, focusing on teaching pumpkin carving, producing art, and preparing for the busy Halloween season.
